name: Uta (001)
effect: [DON!! x1][When Attacking][Once Per Turn] Reveal 1 card from the top of your deck and add up to 1 [FILM] type card to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck.

name: Uta (002)
effect:
[Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)
[End of Your Turn] You may trash 1 Event from your hand: Set up to 1 of your [FILM] type Characters as active.

name: Backlight
effect:
[Main] If your Leader is [Uta], choose one:
• Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.
• K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

name: New Genesis
effect: [Main] If your Leader is [Uta], look at 3 cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to 1 [FILM] type card other than [New Genesis] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order and set up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

name: I'm invincible
effect:
[Main] Set up to 1 of your [Uta] Leader as active.
[Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.
